title: Strengthening Practical Competencies in System Design: Writing Explanatory Paragraphs Using Reverse-Engineering-Based Graphic Organizers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze components of explanatory paragraphs and convert them into graphic organizers using a reverse engineering approach
Learners can develop systematic instructional strategies that reduce cognitive load by using color-coded graphic organizers
Through a two-week practical project, learners can measure improvements in learners' explanatory writing abilities
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
